DataSource.Query: SELECT finance.transaction_master.office_id, core.offices.office_code, finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id, finance.transaction_master.transaction_code, finance.transaction_master.transaction_ts, finance.transaction_master.value_date, account.users.name AS entered_by, finance.transaction_master.reference_number, finance.transaction_master.statement_reference, core.verification_statuses.verification_status_name AS status, finance.transaction_master.verification_reason, verified_by_user.name AS verified_by, sales.customer_receipts.customer_id, inventory.customers.customer_code, inventory.customers.customer_name, inventory.customers.company_zip_code, inventory.customers.company_po_box, inventory.customers.company_address_line_1, inventory.customers.company_address_line_2, inventory.customers.company_street, inventory.customers.company_city, inventory.customers.company_state, sales.customer_receipts.currency_code, sales.customer_receipts.amount, sales.customer_receipts.er_debit, core.offices.currency_code AS home_currency_code, sales.customer_receipts.amount * sales.customer_receipts.er_debit AS amount_in_home_currency, sales.customer_receipts.er_credit, inventory.customers.currency_code AS base_currency_code, sales.customer_receipts.amount * sales.customer_receipts.er_debit * sales.customer_receipts.er_credit AS amount_in_base_currency FROM sales.customer_receipts INNER JOIN finance.transaction_master ON finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id = sales.customer_receipts.transaction_master_id INNER JOIN inventory.customers ON inventory.customers.customer_id = sales.customer_receipts.customer_id INNER JOIN core.verification_statuses ON finance.transaction_master.verification_status_id = core.verification_statuses.verification_status_id INNER JOIN account.users ON finance.transaction_master.user_id = account.users.user_id INNER JOIN core.offices ON finance.transaction_master.office_id = core.offices.office_id LEFT JOIN account.users AS verified_by_user ON finance.transaction_master.verified_by_user_id = verified_by_user.user_id WHERE finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id=@transaction_master_id;
